title: NA’s former opposition leader Raja Riaz joins PML-N, endorses Nawaz Sharif’s leadership
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 16 (APP): Raja Riaz, the former leader of the opposition in the National Assembly, on Saturday, conveyed his unwavering trust in the leadership of PML-N Chief Muhammad Nawaz Sharif and officially declared joining the Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz (PML-N).
Raja Riaz became a member of the PML-N during a meeting held in London, where he met with PML-N Chief Muhammad Nawaz Sharif and the President of PML-Na. Also in attendance at the meeting were Senator Ishaq Dar, Mian Nasir Janjua, Attaullah Tarar, Malik Ahmed Khan, Azam Nazir Tarar, and Amjad Pervaiz.
